trans-unit.target: Yours is a great strength to be measured against, but I daresay I am drawing closer by the day. Would you not agree?<tab>Yours is a great strength to be judged against, but I do believe I'm improving. Would you not agree?

Leave your next foe to me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. They will make good sport for my training!<tab>Leave your next foe to me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I could use a good challenge for my training!
These trials seem unending─a true test of my will. I was not expecting such hardship.<tab>These trials are unrelenting─a true test of my resolve. I was not expecting such hardship.

My will would have broken long ago without you at my side. But together, I feel we can stand against any foe!<tab>My resolve would surely have broken long ago were you not at my side. But together, I feel no challenge is too great!

What is that look, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Do you fear for my well-being? Worry not! Our battles together have only just begun.<tab>What is that gaze, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Do you fear for my safety? You needn't worry so. Our battles together are far from over!

Are you certain this will work? What if I... No, I mustn't think such foolish things. Come, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, let us seek new foes!<tab>Are you sure this will work? What if I... No, I mustn't doubt myself. Not now. Come, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, let us seek a new challenge!
Absorbing aether is so much easier now. I feel myself growing stronger with every battle!<tab>Absorbing aether is so much easier now. With every triumph I feel my power increasing!

Am I living up to your expectations? I realize there is much I might yet do to prove myself to you.<tab>I do hope I am meeting your expectations. Though I realize there is much I must yet do to prove myself to you.
The strength you have bestowed upon me is changing somehow... It feels more...focused.<tab>The strength you have lent me is changing somehow... It feels more...focused.
Just a bit more... Yes, I sense that great power is nearly within reach.<tab>Just a little more... Yes, I sense that great power is nearly within my grasp.

This power is unlike anything I've experienced before. So intense, so focused. I... I think I'm ready, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.<tab>This power is unlike anything I've experienced before. So intense, so focused. I... I think I'm ready, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
